message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exceptional item that has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the quality of your product, the price is a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to purchase it for $6,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget, I am proposing a revised price of $9,000 for the product. This still reflects its true value while making it more accessible to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate you working with my budget.  However, $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. Could we settle on $7,000?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I'm glad to find common ground on pricing. In light of your feedback, I propose a final offer of $8,500 for the product. This is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget.
Alice, thanks for your willingness to negotiate. While $8,500 is close, I'm afraid I can't go any higher than $7,500.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your offer, I am willing to accept $8,000 as the final price for the product. Thank you for your patience throughout this negotiation process.
